channel.description: Recent content in Winforms on Under construction...

item.title: WinForms - Getting Started
item.description: Winforms - What is it? Winforms projects are a simple way to get started with C# programming. They combine a simple front end (screen) with a closely linked backend (code). Below is a very short overview of how to build a simple winforms project using C#. For guidance with a bit more clarity follow this link to my winforms resources link here How to work with Winforms (a short guide) You’ll need some free software, MS Visual Studio Community Edition, avaliable here –> Download Visual Studio.

Tutorial 2...5 - coming soon!
item.description: Simply use this guide as a self-guided classroom / training room resource. It has been written in MS Word so you can use it as is, or you can edit as appropriate. 1 When editing any documents, please include an original author citation, thank you. ↩︎
